          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transfer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência de energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasferimento di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακή μεταφορά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transferencia de energía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that all the light, heat and sound from a television set is spread out and wasted as heat in the end.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">television</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waste</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß alles Licht, Hitze 
und Ton von einem Fernseher heraus verbritten wird und als Hitze im 
Ende vergeudet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que tous les lumière, 
chaleur et bruit d'un téléviseur est étendue et gaspillée comme 
chaleur à la fin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que toda a luz, calor e 
som de um jogo de televisão estão espalhados para fora e 
desperdiçados como o calor na extremidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che tutti i luce, 
calore e suono da un televisore è sparsa fuori ed è sprecata come 
calore alla fine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι όλοι το φως, η 
θερμότητα και ο ήχος από ένα τηλεοπτικό σύνολο διαδίδονται έξω
και σπαταλιούνται ως θερμότητα στο τέλος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que toda la luz, calor y
sonido de una televisión está separada hacia fuera y perdida como 
calor en el extremo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
